name: The Painted Lady
description:
This project is an old piece of software done in 72 hours and should be approached as such.  It was uploaded to Newgrounds on Dec 14, 2016 as a Ludum Dare 37 submission with the following description:

This nogame is about a life in a room.
Art: Bakir Khawam, Edu Verz  Writing: Adrian Castro Code: Quike Zarraga  Music: Beícoli
You can download the soundtrack here:
https://soundcloud.com/beicoli/fight https://soundcloud.com/beicoli/darling 

THIS NO-GAME CONTAINS SEXUAL THEMES. 
Lee el artículo de Anait de Victor Martinez sobre este no-juego aquí.
